name: Export Corp.
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 42 Compo

What is this game? 

This game is about arranging blocks and export them.

Basic Controls

 Left Click: Select block

 (While Block is selected) Right Click: Destroy Block

 (While Block is selected) Left Click: Place Block

 Wheel Button or  “W”: skip Current Day/Night

 R: Restart game

 M: Mute BGM

 P or Esc: Pause
